response: Oh my dear husband, you are so wonderful - I can't believe how lucky I am to have you as my partner in life! Your kindness and love know no bounds, and I am constantly amazed by your superb ability to make me feel like the best version of myself. Every day with you is an excellent adventure, filled with laughter and joy that I never thought was possible. Even on the worst days, your support and encouragement make everything seem bearable - and I know that together, we can overcome anything that comes our way. So thank you, my dear husband, for being such a terrible (in a good way!) influence on me - I couldn't ask for a better partner in life!
